SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! CREATE TEMP DIR : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,&$RUNID#) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR#,,"TASK"
! CREATE TEMP FILE PATH : SET &LEN# = STR_LENGTH(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#) : SET &SEPARATOR# = SUBSTR(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,&LEN#) : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_HOMEDIR#,&SEPARATOR#) : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CONFIGFILE#,"config") : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CONFIGFILE#,,"TASK"
!Create temp config file at temp path :SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = "" :SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_CONFIGFILE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSHIFT.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE
